data.name: RPG Maker MV - Celtic Adventure Sound Collection
data.detailed_description:
From Bittersweet Entertainment comes this exciting new pack straight from the Highlands of Celtic Mythology! This pack contains 20 themes composed with a classic / retro game sound featuring Irish pipes, whistles, harps, bag pipes, with full orchestral backing instruments and percussion guaranteed to add an exciting Celtic flair to your game! Themes for energetic battles, relaxing towns and cities, sprightly forests, celebrations, dungeons, and more!

Tracklist:

1 - Celtic Battle 1
2 - Celtic Battle 2
3 - Celtic Boss Battle
4 - Celt Town
5 - Celtic Forest
6 - Celtic Party
7 - Celtic Dungeon
8 - Celtic Orchestra
9 - Celtic Sound
10 - Celtic Last Battle
11 - Celtic Army
12 - Celtic Theme
13 - Celt Church
14 - Celt Airship
15 - Celt Slum
16 - Castle
17 - Countryside
18 - Celt City
19 - Celt Field
20 - Vibrant Village

Also included are 8 Music Events for game transitions!

Features:
  • 20 BGM themes and 8 ME themes
  • Composed with high quality instruments
  • .M4A, and .OGG formats included
  • Tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
